thread.title: AMBER ALERT: 8-year-old abducted in Ruston
thread.title_full: AMBER ALERT: 8-year-old abducted in Ruston - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Sam Winstrom, Assignment Editor
title: AMBER ALERT: 8-year-old abducted in Ruston
text:
RUSTON, LA (WVUE) - State Police issued an Amber Alert Sunday after a child may have been abducted in Louisiana.
According to police, 8-year-old Dakota Knox was last seen around 7:25 a.m. on Oct. 25 at the Lincoln Motel in Ruston, La. Police say he was asleep in the rear seat of a car that was stolen from the motel. The car, a black 2000 Mercury Mountaineer with Louisiana license plate ZAW146, is believed to have been stolen by Sommer Ann Hattaway.
Dakota Knox is believed to be in imminent danger. He is described as a white male child with sandy hair and blue eyes. He is about 4-feet tall and weights 70 lbs. He was last seen wearing an orange shirt, yellow shorts and a yellow jacket.
Sommer Ann Hattaway is described as a 23-year-old white woman with brown hair and blue eyes. She is about 5'2" tall and weighs about 115 lbs.
Anyone with information on Dakota Knox's location is asked to call police at 318-225-4141 or 911 immediately.
